summary: An ordinance relating to the Municipal Light and Power Plant and system and authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to prepare and adopt plans and specifications for and to proceed with the construction and acquisition of a 78" wood stave pipe line at Cedar Falls, extending from the masonry dam northwesterly a distance of approximately 2540 feet from the pipe line bridge at or near said Cedar River masonry dam and authorizing said Board of incur an indebtedness against the Light Fund and appropriating money therefor as a loan to Capital Account.
